item.title: Meterpreter show_mount
item.description: Meterpreter’s STDAPI extension (the one that always gets loaded) has a new command. This doesn’t happen very often so it’s worth noting. The new command prints out the currently attached “mounts”. In windows world, that means the normal CD ROM, C drive, etc, but it also means all of the mounted network drives as well. This gets very interesting when you happen to find yourself in a VM environment where you can start writing files to the host:
